Additional features that I may want to a.Server Management: Allow modification of system level settings like DNS from the web UI.
Additional features that I may want to a.Service Moniroting: Uses nmap/wget/etc to collect and monitor if ports are open and the service information.
Additional features that I may want to a.Netflow Collection: Collects netflow stats and runs reports

Ping.Description: Pings all devices that have this collector enabled. If ping fails a traceroute will be performed to see if there was a network interruption.

Traceroute.Description: Performs a typical traceroute and fails over to an intelligent tcp traceroute if the standard method fails.

SNMP System.Description: Collects basic SYSTEM info via SNMP.

SNMP HW.Description: Collects basic Hardware info via SNMP.

SNMP Network.Description: Collects Network interfaces and throughput stats via SNMP.

SNMP Routing.Description: Collects the Routing table via SNMP.

SNMP Custom.Description: Collects vendor specific SNMP information that's defined in the snmpmap file located in the conf directory.

Configuration.Description: Runs custom scripts to collect vendor specific configuration info.

Account Profiles.Description: List of remote Username/Password combos to get into the system. Elevated is the 2nd level password which is called in certain scripts. (ex. Cisco Enable

Configuration Management.Description: Settings for connecting to devices to collect its configuration.

Alerts.Description: Alert settings, only email alerts for now
Alerts.Alert Site Contacts: yes/no, this will email the contact configured for the site where the device is located

Ping.Threshold: 5, trigger an alert after this many ping fails.
